ValidationRule.description: Do not allow the RSM or VP to change the MgrSignedDate by more than 2 days on an approved opportunity.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Mrg_Approved__c, "Closed (Ink)"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Mrg_Approved__c), "Closed (Ink)")), OR(($Profile.Name = "RegionalSalesMgr"), ( $Profile.Name = "VicePres")), OR(Approved_Date__c - Mgr_Signed_Date__c >6, Mgr_Signed_Date__c - Approved_Date__c >6))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot change Mgr Signed Date by more than 3 days from original Approval Date.
